name: Comfort Food (ameily_with_an_a)
description:
Control with WASD! try not to fall!

As an orange, you live in a modern, globalized world where cuisines from all cultures are just at the tip of your fingers. You are overjoyed, going from cuisines to cuisines, losing yourself in food. But in the end, you poop them out anyways, and you will always be empty. (did not intend to be grim, I love food! pls enjoy food!)

all food assets are collected from a variety of sources from both the Unity Asset Store and Sketchfab.
